cards.title: Gamblesheep
cards.description: Call a number, roll a dice, if you do the number you called you gain one sheep. If you fail you can try again, but this time you will gain two sheep or lose one

cards.title: Gamblesheep
cards.description: Call a number, roll a dice, if you do the number you called you gain one sheep. If you fail you can try again, but this time you will gain two sheep or lose one

cards.title: Gamblesheep
cards.description: Call a number, roll a dice, if you do the number you called advance one space. If you fail you can try again, but this time you will advance two spaces or go back one

cards.title: Sponsorsheep
cards.description: The player with the biggest herd gives you one sheep, thank your sponsor! In case two or more players have or the same amount of sheep you can choose your sponsor

cards.description: For one round all players cannot lose sheep. (Effect ends with the beginning of the next round of the player who has drawn this card)
